description:
Add a little toastiness to your brisk fall hikes. Stretch those final moments of summer’s glow in the Ridge 200 vest. For those days that aren’t cold, but they aren’t really warm either, this soft fleecy vest helps your hold onto your hard earned warmth.

  • Soft recycled polyester holds onto warm air, wicks away moisture, and dries quickly
  • Lightly insulated with mainly biodegradable PrimaLoft® Bio™ insulation, potential for more than 93% to break down in less than 2 years
  • YKK® Vislon® zipper rolls smoothly
  • High double layered collar keeps chilly winds at bay
  • Dual zippered hand pockets and a pack-accessible zippered chest pocket
  • Certified B Corporation: certified to meet the highest standards of social and environmental impact
  • Regular fit feels just right and leaves plenty of room to layer
name: Kathmandu Ridge 200 Primaloft Vest - Women's
